text.section:
The following definitions in Article 4 of KRS Chapter 355 apply to this article:
"Clearing house." KRS 355.4-104;
"Item." KRS 355.4-104; and
"Suspends payments." KRS 355.4-104.
In addition, Article 1 of KRS Chapter 355 contains general definitions and principles of construction and interpretation applicable throughout this article.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 242, sec. 52, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 28, effective July 14, 1992.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). Under the authority of KRS 7.136(1), the Reviser of Statutes has added paragraph headings [(a), (b), etc.] before terms referenced in subsections (2) and (3) of this statute that are defined in other statutes. The words in the text were not changed.
